title: GenCon - Confirmed Hobbit 2 standalone packs + 1 new Xpantion and 1 new Cycle coming!

comments.content: After the Hobbit expansion lord of the rings will get a new deluxe expansion and another cycle of packs.

booored said:

After the Hobbit expansion lord of the rings will get a new deluxe expansion and another cycle of packs.



Already 2 or 3 threads for this, why another?
